name: WooCommerce Locations Pack
author: dangoodman

sections.description:
The plugin adds a number of additional location sets to WooCommerce. You can choose locations you want to be added. Check for the list of locations shipped with the plugin below.

If you have an idea about other locations to be included let us know.

  • UK, counties
  • France, departments
  • Austria, states
  • Portugal, districts
  • Ecuador, provinces
  • Cyprus, cities
  • Belize, districts/cities/towns
  • Belgium, provinces

sections.changelog:
1.9.5

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.4.

1.9.4

  • Tested with WordPress 6.4, WooCommerce 8.3.
  • Raise the mim required WooCommerce version to 5.0.

1.9.3

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.9.

1.9.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.8.

1.9.1

  • Declare HPOS compatibility.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.2, WooCommerce 7.6.
  • Raise the min required PHP version to 7.1.

1.9.0

  • Added Belgium provinces.

1.8.7

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.3.

1.8.6

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.1.
  • Raise the minimum required WordPress version to 4.6, WooCommerce to 3.2.

1.8.5

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.0, WordPress 6.1.

1.8.4

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.9.

1.8.3

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.7.

1.8.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.5, WordPress 6.0.

1.8.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.3.

1.8.0

  • Ecuador provinces obsolete since WooCommerce 6.1.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.9, WooCommerce 6.1.

1.7.0

  • Added Belize/Corozal
  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.8.

1.6.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.6.

1.6.1

  • Tested with WordPress 5.8, WooCommerce 5.5.

1.6.0

  • Added districts/cities/towns for Belize.
  • Don’t add legacy UK counties on first install.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.3.

1.5.0

  • Added an updated list of the UK postal areas.

1.4.18

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.2.

1.4.17

  • Tested with WordPress 5.7, WooCommerce 5.1.

1.4.16

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.0.

1.4.15

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6, WooCommerce 4.8.

1.4.14

  • Fix spelling in Scotland / Argyll & Bute.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.7.

1.4.13

  • Egypt cities removed if not active. WooCommerce has them built-in since 4.6.0.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.6.

1.4.12.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.5.

1.4.12

  • Add Greek translations for cities of Cyprus.

1.4.11

  • Prepare for translations of states.
  • Show localized country names on the settings page.

1.4.10

  • Add cities of Cyprus.

1.4.9

  • Fix ‘select all’.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.3.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.5.

1.4.8.4

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.2.

1.4.8.3

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.1.

1.4.8.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.0, WordPress 5.4.

1.4.8.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 3.9.

1.4.8

  • Don’t show obsolete locations on fresh installations.

1.4.7

  • Add cities of Egypt.

1.4.6

  • Tested with WooCommerce 3.7.
  • Fixed typo in Ecuador.

1.4.5

  • Tested up to: 5.2, WC tested up to: 3.6.
  • readme.txt: fix line breaks on wp.org.

1.4.4

  • Add states of Austria.
  • Remove bogus ‘Wales / Hampshire’.

1.4.3

  • Add provinces of Ecuador.

1.4.2

  • Update supported WooCommerce and WordPress versions.

1.4.1

  • Update supported WooCommerce version.
  • Fix the plugin description and tags.

1.4.0

  • Hide the Nigeria option in case it’s not active for WC 3.0+.

1.3.0

  • Added France provinces.
  • Fixed compatibility with PHP 5.3.

1.2.0

  • Removed states of China, India, Malaysia and South Africa since they are now included in Woocommerce by default.

1.1.0

  • Added districts of Portugal.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. The settings page in the admin area.

  2. How that could look to the customer.
sections.reviews:
Great plugin

By yousefmansour on September 29, 2022

Thank you for this! Saved me the trouble of trying to configure WooCommerce manually.

Perfect!

By Gangesh Matta (gangesh) on October 29, 2021

Exactly what I was looking for. Thank you!

The Dogs B0LL0CKS

By dcsireland on September 25, 2021

Awesome, gives the functionality that is required to woocommerce shipping to different parts of France and UK (as well as other countries) Need to add simply code to functions.php to force use of state/county but works like a dream, thank you Dan.

Excellent

By steveb9 on November 8, 2020

Very useful plugin!

Simple but perfect

By rsurfer on October 28, 2020

Does exactly what it needs to do.

fulfill its purpose

By fabioholanda on September 1, 2020

very useful

Super

By argosmedia on March 1, 2019

Great little plugin, thank you!

Does what it says!

By Fortem Digital (twostrong) on December 4, 2018

Should be part of a 'locations' pack in Woo! Until then, this bridges the gap beautifully 😊

Useful

By Pieter Bos (senlin) on October 16, 2016

I used the plugin to add villages to an existing country, very useful.

Nice plugin

By SkyWorks85 on September 3, 2016

Very Good!
Thanks.

short_description: Extends WooCommerce with additional locations, such as UK counties, France departments, etc.
